an5.16:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam balanam etam aggam etam sangahikam etam sanghataniyam, yadidam pannabalam.
an5.16:1.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kutagarassa etam aggam etam sangahikam etam sanghataniyam, yadidam kutam.
an5.16:1.7: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, imesam pancannam balanam etam aggam etam sangahikam etam sanghataniyam, yadidam pannabalan”ti.
